name: Abra The Last Witch
description:
It’s been 10 years since all the Witches were wiped out by the demons.  All except for one. Abra, the last witch has risen from the ashes, and into a new world of her own self-doubt, and of demonic ruin.

Unleash the flames, cast deadly magic, help Abra Conquer her low self-esteem, and rise from the ashes in this magical Shoot em up RPG.

*A Gamepad is highly recommended for this game*

-----------------

Features:

  • Simple combat with both style and depth
  • Unique approach to death mechanics
  • A simple, but emotional story spanning 6 chapters
  • Buckets of Charm 
  • Huge enemy variety
  • Extra content

----------------
